function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of airborne virus transmission due to poor sound-proof protection and insulation in multi-storey buildings","Impact":"Heightened risk of disease transmission and compromised public health","Mitigation":"Use of new materials for enhanced sound-proof protection and building performance, as well as improved construction methods","Technologies":"Advanced insulation materials, improved ventilation systems, sound-proofing technologies","People":"Occupants of multi-storey buildings, public health","Owner":"Construction companies, building designers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of high population density on the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased transmission and spread of contagious diseases in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Rethinking density, compact city design, and urban planning to reduce density-related disease transmission risks","Technologies":"Urban planning strategies for lower density, improved public health infrastructure","People":"Residents of densely populated areas, public health authorities","Owner":"Urban planners, local government, public health authorities"}]}
